[[Portable application|Portable software]] is a class of [[Computer program|software]] that is suitable for use on portable drives such as a [[USB flash drive|USB (thumb) drive]] or [[iPod]] or [[Palm (PDA)|Palm PDA]] with "drive mode", although any [[external hard drive]] can be used.
+
[[Portable application|Portable software]] is a class of [[Computer program|software]] that is suitable for use on portable drives such as a [[USB flash drive|USB (thumb) drive]] or [[digital audio player]] or [[PDA]] with "drive mode", although any [[external hard drive]] can be used.
<ref>{{cite web |url = http://blogcritics.org/archives/2006/09/07/133422.php |title = Fun with Portable Software | date = [[2006-09-07]] | author = John Guilfoil | accessdate = 2008-01-24 }}</ref>
<ref>{{cite web |url = http://blogcritics.org/archives/2006/09/07/133422.php |title = Fun with Portable Software | date = [[2006-09-07]] | author = John Guilfoil | accessdate = 2008-01-24 }}</ref>
<ref>{{cite web |url = http://www.makeuseof.com/tag/portable-software-usb/ |title = 100 Portable Apps for your USB Stick | author = makeuseof.com | accessdate = 2008-01-24 }}</ref>
